name: df-irred
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cir, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, cdif(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cui, cv(s0))), crab(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wne(co(cv(s3), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cv(s4)), cv(s2))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ Irred =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[((Base ` s0)\(Unit ` s0))/ s1]{ s2 ‚àà s1 | ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,(s3[(√ó ` s0)]s4)‚â† s2))})
comment: Define the set of irreducible elements in a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
